data.text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai,
“Kooe go tangada dangada, haga halauwa ina nia soukohp Israel ala e bida hai hua nadau kokohp. Helekai ang gi digaula bolo gi hagalongo gi nia helekai Dimaadua.”
Aanei nia mee Tagi go Yihowah e helekai, “E koia e huaidu ang gi nia soukohp dadaulia aanei! Digaula e bida hai hua go nadau hiihai i nadau lodo, gaa hai nadau moe tilikai.
Nia daangada Israel, godou soukohp la ono hadinga ai, e hai gadoo be nia paana lodo geinga ala e noho i lodo nia hale mooho.

Digaula hagalee hagaloohi nia gowaa ala gu mooho i di abaaba, digaula hagalee hogi e hau haga hoou di maa. Deenei laa, Israel e deemee di abaaba ia i di madagoaa tauwa dela gaa dae mai i di laangi o Dimaadua.

Nadau moe la hagalee e donu, gei nadau helekai kokohp la tilikai hua. Digaula e hai bolo ginaadou e helekai i agu helekai, gei Au digi hagau ina digaula. Gei digaula e hagamaanadu bolo nadau helekai la ga kila aga!
Au ga helekai gi digaula: Godou moe ala ne mmada ginai goodou le e hai gee, gei godou helekai ala ne hai le e tilikai. Goodou e helekai bolo nia helekai ni aagu, gei Au digi helekai adu gi goodou!”
Deelaa laa, Tagi go Yihowah, ga helekai gi digaula, “Godou helekai le e hala, gei godou moe le e hagalee e donu, Au ga hai baahi adu gi goodou.

Au ga hagaduadua goodou go nia soukohp ala e hai godou moe hagalee e donu, gei e hagadagu aga nia mee o di madagoaa dela ga dau mai, e dagi hala nia daangada. Goodou ga hagalee madalia digaula i di madagoaa ma ga dagabuli ai agu daangada e hagataele. Godou ingoo ga hagalee e dau madalia digau Israel, goodou ga hagalee loo e hula labelaa gi di godou henua donu. Gei goodou ga iloo laa bolo ma ko Au go Tagi go Yihowah.

“Nia soukohp e dagi hala agu daangada, ala e helekai boloo, ‘Nia mee huogodoo gu humalia.’ Gei deeai, nia mee huogodoo digi humalia! Agu daangada e hau aga di nadau abaaba gi nia hadu momooho, gei nia soukohp gaa hunu di maa gi nia mee hunu kene.13.10 Jeremiah 6.14; 8.11
Helekai gi nia soukohp bolo di nadau abaaba la ga mooho gi lala. Au ga hagau mai dagu uwa nngolo. Di uwa hadugalaa gaa doo gi hongo di maa, mo di madangi maaloo gaa gono mai gi di maa.
Di abaaba ga mooho, gei digau ga heeu adu be dehee tadinga o nia mee kene ala ne hunu ai di maa?”
Deenei laa, aanei nia mee Tagi go Yihowah e helekai ai, “I lodo dogu hagawelewele gei Au ga hagau mai dagu madangi maaloo, di uwa nngolo, di uwa hadugalaa belee oho di abaaba.

Au gu haganoho bolo Au gaa oho di abaaba dela ne hunu go digaula gi nia mee hunu kene; e oho gi lala gaa dugu di hagamau hadugalaa. Gei di maa ga meheu gi daha ga daaligi goodou huogodoo. Gei digau huogodoo ga iloo laa bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.

“Di abaaba mo digau ala ne hunu di maa gi nia mee hunu kene ga longono nia mahi o dogu hagawelewele. Gei Au ga hagi adu gi goodou bolo di abaaba la gu hagalee, mo digau ala ne hunu di maa gi nia mee hunu kene,
ala go nia soukohp ala ne helekai i Jerusalem bolo nia mee huogodoo la gu humalia, gei nia maa huogodoo la digi humalia!” Aanei la nnelekai mai baahi o Tagi go Yihowah.
Dimaadua ga helekai, “Deenei laa, kooe go tangada dangada, mmada gi nia ahina ala i lodo au daangada ala e hagadagu aga nia mee ala e kila aga maalia. Hagahalauwa ina digaula,
gei hagi anga ina gi digaula nia helekai mai baahi Tagi go Yihowah ala e helekai ang gi digaula:

Goodou gu hagabalumee Au i mua agu daangada bolo gii mee di kae godou mee ‘barley’ mo godou palaawaa. Goodou gu daaligi nia daangada ala hagalee belee hai gii mmade, gei e daahi nia mouli o digau ala hagalee belee hai gi mouli. Goodou guu hai di godou kai tilikai gi agu daangada, gei digaula gu hagadonu goodou.”

Malaa, aanei nia mee Tagi go Yihowah e helekai, “Au hagalee hiihai gi nia bida loahi ala e hai hegau ai goodou bolo goodou gi hai mee gi di mogobuna ang gi di mouli mo di made. Au ga hagihagi nia maa gi daha mo godou lima, ga hagamehede nia daangada ala guu noho i lala godou mogobuna.
Au ga hahaahi godou gahu libogo ga haga dagaloaha agu daangada gi daha mo godou mogobuna, dolomeenei gaa hana hua beelaa, gei goodou ga iloo laa bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.

“Godou kai tilikai e hagadaamaha lodo o digau ala e humalia, aalaa go digau ala hagalee belee hagaduadua ko Au. Goodou e helekai gi digau huaidu bolo digaula gi hudee dugua nadau haihai huaidu mo di haga dagaloaha nadau mouli.

Deenei laa, godou moe tilikai mo di godou hagadagu aga di madagoaa dela gaa dae mai, mo nia mee ala e dagi huaidu nia daangada la ga hagaodi. Au ga haga dagaloaha agu daangada la gi daha mo godou mogobuna, bolo gi iloo e goodou bolo ma ko Au go Dimaadua.”
